skills.name: Bash

Active: Encase yourself, becoming Unstoppable and gaining +100% Block Chance for {value1} seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Activating Armored Hide grants you Maximum Resolve and increases your Thorns by X for the duration.

runes.name: Adaptable
description: When you Evade through enemies with Armored Hide active, you deal 100% of your Thorns to them and Heal for 5% of your Maximum Life per hit.

runes.name: Reinforced
description: While active, Armored Hide increases your Block Reduction by 5% for every Nearby enemy.

skillsPTR.name: Concussive Stomp
description: Stomp in front of you, releasing a shockwave that deals {value1} damage and Knocks Down enemies for {value2} seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Concussive Stomp grants a Barrier equal to 10% of your Maximum Life per enemy hit for 3 seconds, up to 100%.

runes.name: Adaptable
description: When enemies recover from Concussive Stomp, you Dodge their next 3 attacks.

runes.name: Reinforced
description: Concussive Stomp gains an additional Charge and does 500% increased damage to Unstoppable enemies and Bosses.

skillsPTR.name: Counterattack
description: Passive: Gain 10% Dodge Chance and automatically retaliate against Close enemies for {value1} damage when you Dodge their attacks.
Active: Dodge all direct attacks for 3 seconds per cast, up to 6 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Counterattack's Cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds per stack of Ferocity you have.

runes.name: Adaptable
description: When you Dodge a Control Impairing attack with Counterattack it will reflect that Crowd Control to all Close enemies for 2 seconds.

runes.name: Reinforced
description: Counterattack passively increases your Critical Strike Damage by 10% for every Close enemy.

skillsPTR.name: Scourge
description: Call forth a wave of insects that bite enemies, Fearing and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds while applying {value1} Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Each time you hit an enemy with Scourge you gain 1% increased damage vs Crowd Controlled enemies for 6 seconds, up to 50%.

runes.name: Adaptable
description: Lucky Hit: Hitting an enemy affected by Scourge has up to a 50% chance to Life Steal 35% of the damage done.

runes.name: Reinforced
description: Casting Scourge grants 100% of your Maximum Vigor over 6 seconds.

skillsPTR.name: Antivenom
description: You gain + {value1} increased Poison Resistance and your Maximum Poison Resistance is increased by + {value2} .

skillsPTR.name: Nourishment
description: Your Healing is increased by +20%. Whenever you Heal, your Poisoning Damage is increased by x {value1} for 3 seconds.

skillsPTR.name: Patient Guard
description: Gain +10% Block Chance. After standing still for 0.5 seconds, you gain + {value1} Block Damage Reduction until you next move.

skillsPTR.name: Bastion
description: Gain [X] Thorns. While you have a Barrier your Thorns are increased by x20%.

skillsPTR.name: Auspicious
description: After not taking damage for 5 seconds, you gain up to {value1} of your Maximum Life as a Barrier over 10 seconds.

skillsPTR.name: Resilient

skillsPTR.name: Dominant

skillsPTR.name: Payback
description: Smash enemies in front of you, dealing {value1} damage.
When attacked, you have a 35% chance to reduce Payback's active Cooldown by 1 seconds.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Each time an enemy attacks you the damage they take from Payback is increased by 5% for 60 seconds, up to 75%.

runes.name: Poised
description: Payback passively grants you Vigor when you take damage. Payback is now a Core Skill and consumes all available Vigor to increase its damage by 0.5% for each point spent.

runes.name: Invasive
description: Becoming Control Impaired while Payback is on Cooldown makes it free to cast and grants you Unstoppable for 3 seconds. Can only occur once every 30 seconds.

skillsPTR.name: Brilliance

skillsPTR.name: Acceleration
description: Casting an Eagle Skill grants + {value1} increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

skillsPTR.name: Razor Wings
description: Whirl out a cluster of razor sharp spirit feathers that rebound back, dealing {value1} damage each way.

runes.name: Enhanced
description: Razor Wings makes enemies Vulnerable for 5 seconds when hitting with a Critical Strike or from behind.

runes.name: Poised
description: Razor Wings has a 10% chance to regain a Charge when they hit an enemy a second time. Double this chance if you have an active Barrier.

runes.name: Invasive
description: Razor Wings consumes 3 Charges to send out a spiral of 3 wings at once.

skillsPTR.name: Rushing Claw
description: Slash a short distance through an enemy, striking all enemies along the way twice for a total of {value1} damage.

description: Enemies hit by Rushing Claw take 10% increased damage from Rushing Claw, up to 80%.

runes.name: Poised

runes.name: Invasive
description: Using Rushing Claw's last Charge will instantly refill all Charges by consuming 4 stacks of Ferocity.

skillsPTR.name: Potent
description: Hitting enemies with Jaguar Skills increases the damage they take from you by x {value1} up to x {value2} .

skillsPTR.name: Furnace
description: Jaguar Skills deal x {value1} increased Critical Strike Damage per stack of Ferocity.

skillsPTR.name: Touch of Death
description: Strike an enemy and infect them, dealing 5% damage and applying {value1} Poisoning damage over 9 seconds.
When the infection expires or the host dies, a swarm hatches and seeks enemies for 9 seconds, dealing {value2} damage per hit.
You can have up to 3 swarms active at once.

runes.name: Enhanced
description:
Touch of Death's infection Heals you for 2% of your Maximum Life per second for a total of 18% Maximum Life. You
Heal any remaining when the swarm hatches.

runes.name: Poised
description: Touch of Death is now a Core Skill which costs 70 Vigor and has no Cooldown.

runes.name: Invasive
description: Touch of Death's swarm bursts every second, applying 30% of its Base Poisoning damage over 6 seconds to surrounding enemies.

skillsPTR.name: Ravenous
description: Your Centipede Skills deal x {value1} increased damage. Double this bonus vs Healthy enemies.

skillsPTR.name: Oppressive
description: Your Centipede Skills deal x {value1} increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies and gain +30% increased Crowd Control Durations.

skillsPTR.name: The Protector
description: The Gorilla Spirit protects an area for 6 seconds, continuously smashing surrounding enemies for {value1} damage and granting you Barrier for 15% of your Maximum Life every 1.5 seconds.

runes.name: Harmonious
description: The Protector's strikes deal 300% increased damage to Non-Elite enemies and reduce the damage you take from Elite enemies by 30% for 6 seconds.

runes.name: Exalted
description: The Protector's area persists for an additional 6 seconds. While in the area you are Unstoppable and any enemies or Small Missiles inside are Slowed by 80%.

skillsPTR.name: The Seeker
description: The Eagle Spirit swoops down and deals {value1} damage. After a short delay it blasts off dealing {value2} damage.

description: The Seeker's first hit Knocks enemies Down for 4 seconds and the second hit is a guaranteed Critical Strike.

runes.name: Exalted
description: The Seeker constantly makes all Nearby enemies Vulnerable while active.

skillsPTR.name: The Hunter
description: Bound across the battlefield with the Jaguar Spirit, dealing {value1} damage upon landing and the rapidily slashing enemies in the area for {value2} total damage over 7 strikes.

runes.name: Harmonious

runes.name: Exalted

skillsPTR.name: The Devourer
description: The Centipede Spirit emerges, blasting enemies in a line for {value1} damage and spitting at others for {value2} damage. Lasts for 15 seconds.

runes.name: Harmonious
description: As it emerges, The Devourer launches 10 toxic globs that apply 210% Poisoning damage over 6 seconds wherever they land.

runes.name: Exalted
description: While The Devourer is active, if a Non-Boss enemy's remaining Life becomes Poisoned they die instantly and unleash a Pestilent Swarm that deals 30% damage per hit to enemies it passes through.

skillsPTR.name: Resolution
description: Casting an Ultimate Skill grants x {value1} increased damage to Elites for 3 seconds. Double this bonus if you are only fighting one enemy.

skillsPTR.name: Spiritual Attunement
description: Your maximum Vigor is increased by {value1} while you have an Ultimate Skill equipped.

skillsPTR.name: Supremacy
description: Any enemies you kill while an Ultimate Skill is active grants a stack of Supremacy, each increasing your damage by x {value1} , up to x {value2} . When an Ultimate Skill ends, you gain 5 stacks of Supremacy, but you begin to lose one stack every second.

skillsPTR.name: Initiative
description: Casting an Ultimate Skill makes you Unstoppable for {value1} seconds.

skillsPTR.name: Intricacy

skillsPTR.name: Sustenance

skillsPTR.name: Vital Strikes
description: You deal x45% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies.
After making an enemy Vulnerable, your next Direct damage dealt to them:
description_list: Heals you for 2% of your Maximum Life
Generates 5 Vigor
Removes the Vulnerable effect

skillsPTR.name: Adaptive Stances
description: The Base Spirit of a Skill cast cast grants:
description_list: Eagle: +30% Movement Speed
Gorilla: 30% Damage Reduction
Jaguar: +30% Attack Speed
Centipede: +30% Life Steal
description2: Casting a Skill of a different Base Spirit:
description_list2: Increases Core Stats by +50% for 5 seconds

skillsPTR.name: Prodigy's Tempo
description: Every 3rd consecutive cast of the same Basic Skill increases all purchased Skills' Ranks by 2 for 5 seconds.
Every 3rd consecutive cast of the same Core or Potency Skill reduces all Skills' active Cooldowns by 10%, increased by 2% for each of their Skill Ranks.

skillsPTR.name: Noxious Resonance
description: Your Critical Strikes cause enemies to burst 100% of their total Poisoning as Direct Poison damage to themselves and surrounding enemies.

skillsPTR.name: Eagle
description: Casting an Eagle Skill grants 2 Storm Feathers, up to a maximum of 8. When you Evade, all Storm Feathers are fired dealing 100% Lightning damage and making targets Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
All Skills are now also Eagle Skills.
description2: For every 4 meters you move, your Critical Strike Chance increases by +4%. This bonus is reset 2 seconds after you Critically Strike.

skillsPTR.name: Jaguar
description: Every 4th time you deal direct damage to an enemy with a Jaguar Skill, unleash additional slashes dealing 100% of the damage of the 4 hits.
All Skills are now also Jaguar Skills.
description2: Gain 1 stack of Ferocity whenever you kill an enemy or damage a Boss.

skillsPTR.name: Gorilla
description: Casting a Gorilla Skill deals 100% Thorns to enemies you hit and grants a Barrier for 10% of Maximum Life, up to 40%, for 3 seconds.
All Skills are now also Gorilla Skills.
description2: When you have at least 5 stacks of Resolve, you are Unstoppable.

skillsPTR.name: Centipede
description: Hititng an enemy with a Centipede Skill reduces their Damage by 2.5% and Slows them by 10% for 3 seconds, stacking up to a maximum of 8 times.
All Skills are now also Centipede Skills.
description2: Heal for 1% of your Maximum Life, for every Nearby enemy you've Poisoned in the last 3 seconds, up to 5%.
